an10.122:1.1: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamma bhavita bahulikata asavanam khayaya samvattanti.
an10.122:1.3: Sammaditthi, sammasankappo, sammavaca, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati, sammasamadhi, sammananam, sammavimutti—
an10.122:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamma bhavita bahulikata asavanam khayaya samvattanti”ti.
